name: Coastal Guesthouse
description: A friendly guesthouse with stunning ocean views, offering free breakfast and a shared kitchen for guests.

name: City Center Guesthouse
description: Conveniently located in the city center, this guesthouse provides easy access to local attractions with excellent amenities.

name: Countryside Inn
description: A peaceful guesthouse in the countryside with beautiful garden views and outdoor seating areas for relaxation.

name: Mountain View Guesthouse
description: Nestled in the mountains, this guesthouse offers stunning views, access to hiking trails, and a cozy fireplace.

name: Historic Downtown Guesthouse
description: A charming guesthouse in the historic district, blending modern amenities with classic architecture and a lovely garden.

name: Lakeside Guesthouse
description: A relaxing lakeside retreat with direct lake access, offering kayaks for guests and an outdoor BBQ area.
